name: Sniper Strike Robber City
description:
Sniper Strike Robber City is an action and shooting game where you have to save the city from evil robbers just act like a superhero. The city is crowded with criminals and inmates causing trouble in the city. You need to be flawless with your aim while you shoot with your sniper rifle. Stop the illegal deals and robbers with your precision sniper shooting skills in this war against the scary criminals. The city sniper battle has begun in this ultimate war shooter strike against the mafia world. This is the intense survival city for you and as a police sniper it’s a battle against the crime town. Prepare to play as the real sniper shooter and take out the crime from the city. Equip with the exotic arsenal and find out the culprits. Governing the security of the whole city is not an easy task but there is nothing impossible.
Features:
- Variety of guns.
- Smooth controls.
- Outstanding sounds effects.
- Addictive mission.
- Amazing graphics with 3D environment.
- Easy to understand challenging to play.
